result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver Non-Narcotics [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense, PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
With good time and Huber release.
Deft may serve jail sentence at Dickinson County Jail or another correctional institution in Michigan, if agreeable between the jails.

Payment of DNA surcharge.  Repayment of $150 buy money.  All other fines/costs are remitted.
All financials are due within 60 days or civil judgment will be entered and referral to State Debt Collections.

records.addlTxt:
8:22 AM Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by video, in custody at Dickinson County Jail.  Attorney Brad Hansen appeared by video for Andrea Lu Lafountain.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court reviews PleaQuest/WOR form that has been efiled by Atty Hansen.
Court heard on off record discussion with DA regarding agreement.
Atty Hansen agrees.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Elements of offense.
Court reviews maximum penalties.
Deft understands.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on a jury until civil rights are restored.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1 without Deliver near a park or repeater modifiers.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Atty Hansen satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1 with 2nd & Subsequent and PTAC modifiers.
Court dismisses the Dist/Deliver Drugs On/Near Park modifier from Count 1.
Court dismisses the Repeater modifier from Count 1.
Court dismisses and reads-in Count 2.
DA heard on sentencing.
Atty Hansen heard on sentencing.
Court heard on factors.
Court imposes on Count 1:
1 year jail, with good time and huber release.
Credit for 152 days time served.
Deft may serve the jail sentence at the Dickinson County Jail, or another correctional institution in Michigan, in agreeable between the jails.
Payment of DNA surcharge only.
Remit all other fines & costs.
Deft must pay back the $150 buy money.
DNA sample due 08-24-2022.
Appeal rights.
8:45 AM
OFF RECORD: Court orders 60 days to pay or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.

3:30 PM Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by video, in custody at Dickinson County Jail.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Andrea Lu Lafountain. 
Court calls case.
Atty Hansen heard on status.
Believes case is resolved.
DA heard on reasons why the Deft did not appear by writ today due to case in Michigan.
Requests sentencing be scheduled prior to October 4, when her sentencing is scheduled in Michigan.
Court heard and approves Deft to appear by ZOOM for a plea hearing.
DA has no objection to Deft appearing remotely for a plea.
Atty Hansen heard and would like to appear in person with Deft to give a plea.
Parties agree to a Reserve Judge taking a plea.
Court schedules with parties.
3:42 PM
Plea hearing scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:00 am.

Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by Zoom video, in custody in Dickinson County.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Andrea Lu Lafountain. 
3:07 p.m.
Copy of Information.
Waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Requests STC.
Atty Hansen to keep DAs office advised of status in case writ needed.
3:10 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

11:56 AM Prosecuting Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by video, in custody from Dickinson County Jail. Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Andrea Lu Lafountain. 
Court calls case. 
Atty spks on bond modification. 
DA responds. 
Court denies bond modification. 
12:01 PM
Notice of motion and motion for reduction of bail

3:47 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appears via video, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Andrea Lu Lafountain. 
Oral record of waiver form from deft. no copy of form provided due to deft. being out of state
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Court allows for ZOOM appearance for ARGN, same instructions as used today
4:13PM
Arraignment scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

8:40 AM Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by video, in custody at Dickinson County Jail.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Andrea Lu Lafountain. 
Court calls case.
COpy of complaint.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed with deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim and waives time limits.
Deft may appear by Zoom for the prelim.
DA heard.
Parties argue.
Deft heard - agrees to appear by ZOOM for prelim.
8:44 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Letter from JA to Deft RE: communication

09:44 AM Defendant Andrea Lu Lafountain in court, in custody at Dickinson County Jail.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Andrea Lu Lafountain appeared by ZOOM means.
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Deft heard - has not received a copy of the complaint.
Court reviews charges and max penalties.
Deft understands.
DA heard on bond recommendations.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $10,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with co-deft or confidential informant. 
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
Court schedules with parties.
Deft to appear in person for the next hearing if she is not in Dickinson County Jail.
If deft is still at Dickinson County Jail, she may appear by video.
9:52 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
on 3-25-22 by BPOWELL - Detained at Dickinson Co Jail
